app.name: Jatana
app.short_description: Automate Repetitive Tasks like Macro Suggestion, Ticket Replies, Ticket Categorisation & More
app.long_description:
*Are you looking at ways to automate repetitive, boring and low added value tasks?

Do you want to free up agent's time to better focus on your customers?*

**Jatana is what you want and what you need** 



At Jatana, we are bringing Artificial Intelligence at the fingertips of every customer support team in the world.

**Why?** Because every customer support team has the need to automate repetitive tasks, so to invest more time in what really matters: talking to customers.



With Jatana, you can power up your Zendesk account by having an Artificial Intelligence that can:



- **Suggest the best macro**: save up to 40% in answering time

- **Send automatic replies**: answering time is a few seconds and you save $4 per ticket

- **Automate case categorization and routing**: automate repetitive tasks! 

- **Connect to 3rd party systems via API**: automate processes involving Magento, Shopify, your CRM and more



The reason why Jatana is a ground-breaking offer is that **you can build your own AI engines directly from our dashboard**. 

**No big setup fee or processes**, you can **get started in minutes** 



**Would you like to see Jatana in action?** Schedule a live demo today by clicking [HERE] (https://cal.mixmax.com/francescostasi/25) 



Jatana is your secret weapon to create the most valuable customer experiences and it is used by major corporations like **Dansk Supermarked**, hyper-growth startups like **HappyFresh** and by small companies too. 



**#macro - #automation - #AI - #savetime - #savemoney - #deliverbetterCX**







**Pricing**

**Starting at only $ 199/ mo** - you have no excuse not to get started today! 



**Custom implementations** 

For big enterprises or companies looking for custom implementations, we and our Zendesk Partners have you covered. 



Email us at getstarted@jatana.ai for further questions. 



**Would you like to see Jatana in action?** Schedule a live demo today by clicking [HERE] (https://cal.mixmax.com/francescostasi/25) 



**Benefits of using Jatana**

These are the benefits you experience from the first day of using Jatana: 



- **Boost productivity up to 35%:** Suggested macros reduce First Reply Time (FRT) up to one minute.

- **Reduce Average Handling Time (AHT) up to 40%:** Thanks to automatic triaging, automatic replies and suggested macros. 

- **Increase customer satisfaction (CSAT):** Customers value fast replies from support agents!

- **Reduce employee turnover:** Support agents are more motivated to interact and provide value to customers. 

- **Improved onboarding of new agents:** Jatana improves up-start times of agents in contact centers.

- **Privacy by design:** Personal data is never accessed nor used by Jatana and of course, we are GDPR compliant. 

- **Hassle-free integration:** You wonâ€™t need to involve your IT team to have Jatana up and running. 



**Would you like to see Jatana in action?** Schedule a live demo today by clicking [HERE] (https://cal.mixmax.com/francescostasi/25)

1. Install the app and create an account on our website at [jatana.ai] (https://www.jatana.ai) 

2. Train the AI 

3. Enjoy!
